attributes.action: Stop all low skilled immigrants from entering the UK after March 2019
attributes.background: It has become apparent that following the Home Office White Paper that low skilled immigrants will still be allowed to enter the UK after Brexit. This is not taking back control of borders and is not respecting the Referendum result or the Tory Manifesto.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petitions because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

We aren't sure whether you mean to include non-skilled workers from all countries or just EU countries.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the changes you would like to make to immigration law.
